name: Zero G Recovery
description:
Zero G Recovery

A futuristic game where you play as a battlefield medic rescuing injured teammates after battle while navigating the harsh environments of zero gravity space.

How to Play

Aim - Mouse pointer

Push off wall/Push held object - Space

Mute Sound - M 

Quit Level - Esc

Project

This is game 8 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and follow me on my social media below.

Follow the project
